ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, I priced that out a while back and have been putting it off.  I ve already upgraded the modem (to a winmodem of all things!  F1 /bonk), the hard
ygData.messageBody:
> > Something wrong with a PII 200 with 64 MB RAM? Heh heh.
>
>
> Your best cost/benefit upgrade would be another 64meg of RAM,
> that should
> improve things a LOT.
>
> Tszaaz

Yeah, I priced that out a while back and have been putting it off. I've
already upgraded the modem (to a winmodem of all things! F1 /bonk), the
hard drive (it's a bad sign when you have to delete Powerpoint to fit
Everquest), the sound card, and countless drivers. I feel like I'm sinking
time and money into a junk car at this point. So my intention is to live
with it for a while longer then splurge on a whole new unit.

But anyway, that doesn't alter the fact that Blackburrow is laggier than any
other low level zone (except perhaps low-level RoK zones) and still seems an
odd choice for a bard to hunt in. Tszaaz, do you experience lag ANYWHERE???


Peace
Evulia

You have gotten better at client prediction (55)
You have gotten better at chasing ghosts (42)
<snipped - 20 seconds worth of blank lines from log file>
Pain and suffering hit YOU for 5 points!
You were injured by running smack into a wall that you were unable to steer
away from
You tell the group, "zoning"
<five minutes later>
You have entered Qeynos Hills

Heh
